attributes.background:
We are protesting in hope of eliminating period product tax. It is general knowledge that periods are natural and cannot be helped, so should not be classed as a "luxury". 
We spend around £18,000 each, in our lifetimes. However NHS supply free contraception, costing them £28,000 a year.
